text:
After you received your robotic call and after they eventually called you, how long did it take for them to update the page where it said you only completed half of your claim etc, to completed and ready to go?  
Its been two days already for me after the call but I was told it should of been ready already for me , when she told me before hanging up.  
How long it take you to get your page updated to completed? Its still telling me to call.
title: For those who received a call from the unemployment
